function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of replacement signs for COVID-19 measures communication","Impact":"Increased risk of customer and employee exposure to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and replacement of signs, clear communication protocols for employees","Technologies":"Digital signage systems, automated sign replacement systems","People":"Customers, customer-facing employees","Owner":"Retail management"},{"Description":"Panic buying leading to stockouts and scarcity of essential goods","Impact":"Panic buying behavior, shortage of essential goods, increased risk of exposure due to overcrowding in stores","Mitigation":"Implementation of purchase limits, improved supply chain management, public communication to discourage panic buying","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, online ordering and delivery systems","People":"General public, retail store management","Owner":"Government, retail store management"},{"Description":"Inadequate communication of stockout reasons to customers","Impact":"Confusion and frustration among customers, potential for rumors and misinformation, negative impact on customer experience","Mitigation":"Clear and transparent communication about stockout reasons, use of digital signage or announcements","Technologies":"Digital signage systems, public address systems","People":"Customers, store employees","Owner":"Retail store management"}]}
